_header: Much harm I have I-told and more I tell can
Subjects: Crispin and Crispinian, saints, lives of; saints’ lives
_description: Lives of SS. Crispin and Crispinian in one MS of the South English Legendary

Bod779.First Lines:
Moche harme Ich habbe I told & more ic telle canhy þe
                    liþer emperour þat het maximian…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…& bring vs to þe ioye þer þey wonneþ
                    inne& leue vs so an erþe to don to heuene blis awinne
Bod779.Attributed Title: Crispin and crispinyan twey holi marteres (f. 197)
Bod779.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Des Ms. Bodl. 779 jüngere Zusatzlegenden zur südlichen
                Legendensammlung.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         82 (1889): 307-422: 343-6.
